Surviving White Winter

January 01, 2016

It was a frozen winter in cold war era. We were two lazy men, a sleepy boy, two long haired women, a husky with attitude, and two shotguns. After three weeks, we finally configure javascript.

But we lost our beloved husky before we finally made it. Now, every january, we remember our husky, that helped all of us to survive.

This is a post kind layout.

As always, should you be caught or killed, any knowledge of your actions will be disavowed.
